relevant_findings.HEENT: (-)LAD, mucous membranes moist, trachea midline, EOMI, PERRL
relevant_findings.abdomen: (+/-) BS x 4 quadrants, soft, mildly tender to palpation incisionally, non-distended
relevant_findings.incisions: Clean, dry and intact, dressed and closed with steristrips
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused, pulses palpable, (+/-) edema
